description: PM Edouard Philippe offers to scrap a key proposal of pension reforms to end a lengthy stoppage.
title: France protests: PM offers pension compromise in bid to end strike
title_page: France protests: PM offers pension compromise in bid to end strike - BBC News
maintext: France raised the official retirement age in the past decade from 60 to 62, but it remains one of the lowest among rich countries - in the UK, for example, the retirement age for state pensions is 66 and is due to rise to at least 67.
